author: jycli
msg: Marked the code to be privileged, which allows users to load
customized entity files in sandbox. Fixed bug report XALANJ-2068.
Patch was reviewed by Brian Minchau (minchau@ca.ibm.com)

author: minchau
msg: Fix for XALANJ-2074, committing patch2 in that issue, which removes two
untranslated messages in SerializerFactory, and uses a new common message

author: mcnamara
msg: Patch for XALANJ-1937.  Change references in the docs from bugzilla to Apache Jira for reporting new issues and checking the status of existing issues.

author: mcnamara
msg: Patch for XALANJ-2026.  Fixes typo in Debugger interface code example.

author: mcnamara
msg: Patch for XALANJ-1990.  Fixes broken link to apidocs for Serializer.html.
